devdoc.details: A simple coin-like contract example. This contract is not standards compliant and is meant for educational purposes. (devdoc)

Transfer(address,address,uint256).details: Event triggered when coins are transferred. (devdoc)

params._from: The address from which the coins are sent.
params._to: The address to which the coins are sent.

constructor.details: Constructor that gives the contract creator an initial balance of 10000 MetaCoins. (devdoc)

params.addr: The address whose balance is to be checked.

getBalanceInEth(address).details: Converts the balance of `addr` from MetaCoins to Ether. (devdoc)

params.addr: The address whose balance is to be checked.

sendCoin(address,uint256).details: Transfers coins from sender's account to receiver's account if the sender has sufficient balance. (devdoc)

params.amount: The amount of MetaCoins to send.

returns.sufficient: Returns true if the sender has enough balance, false otherwise.

devdoc.title: MetaCoin

Transfer(address,address,uint256).notice: Event triggered when coins are transferred. (userdoc)

constructor.notice: Constructor that gives the contract creator an initial balance of 10000 MetaCoins. (userdoc)

getBalance(address).notice: Get the balance of `addr` in MetaCoins. (userdoc)

getBalanceInEth(address).notice: Get the balance of `addr` in Ether. (userdoc)

userdoc.notice: A simple coin-like contract example. This contract is not standards compliant and is meant for educational purposes. (userdoc)
